Name: Gin Old Fashioned
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A couple of shots of bready genever with a spoon of sugar and a couple of dashes of bitters - incredibly simple, equally classic, and with the right genever, incredibly tasty.
History: For a detailed history of the Old-Fashioned cocktail , along with additional recipes, see our page.
Nutrition: One serving of Gin Old Fashioned contains 113 calories
